titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Pauls Crosse the third of March, 1610. By Theophilus Higgons. In testimony of his heartie reunion with the Church of England, and humble submission thereunto. Published by command
titleStmt.author: Higgons, Theophilus, 1578?-1659.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Hall, for William Aspley,

notesStmt.note: In this edition, title page verso has apology for errata "in the former impression .. in this second .. corrected".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
